Package com.epam.services

Interface TariffService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TariffServiceImpl
public interface TariffService
The TariffService interface provides methods for interacting with the DAO and performing business logic related to tariffs.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hrebenozhko Ruslan

  • Method Details

    • getTariffsForView

      List<TariffDTO> getTariffsForView(String fieldName, SortingOrder sortingOrder, Service service, int page, int entriesPerPage) throws TariffServiceException
      Retrieves a sorted and filtered list of TariffDTOs based on the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the name of the field to sort by
      sortingOrder - the order to sort the tariffs
      service - the service to filter tariffs by
      page - the page number to display
      entriesPerPage - the number of tariffs to display per page
      Returns:
      a list of TariffDTOs to display
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer

    • getTariffsCount

      int getTariffsCount(Service service) throws TariffServiceException
      Retrieves the number of tariffs for a specific service.
      Parameters:
      service - the service to count tariffs for
      Returns:
      the number of tariffs for the specified service
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer

    • getAllTariff

      List<TariffDTO> getAllTariff(Service service) throws TariffServiceException
      Retrieves a filtered list of all tariffs for a specific service.
      Parameters:
      service - the service to filter tariffs by
      Returns:
      a list of tariffs for the specified service
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer

    • getUsersTariff

      List<TariffDTO> getUsersTariff(int userId) throws TariffServiceException
      Retrieves a list of all tariffs for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to retrieve tariffs for
      Returns:
      a list of tariffs for the specified user
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer

    • getUnpaidTariffs

      List<TariffDTO> getUnpaidTariffs(int userId) throws TariffServiceException
      Retrieves a list of all tariffs for a specific user that have 0 days until next payment.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to retrieve tariffs for
      Returns:
      a list of tariffs for the specified user with 0 days until next payment
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer

    • getUsersTariffWithDaysUntilPayment

      Map<TariffDTO,Integer> getUsersTariffWithDaysUntilPayment(int userId) throws TariffServiceException
      Retrieves a map of all tariffs for a specific user with the number of days until next payment.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to retrieve tariffs for
      Returns:
      a map of tariffs for the specified user with the number of days until next payment
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer

    • removeTariff

      void removeTariff(int tariffId) throws TariffServiceException
      Removes a Tariff from the persistence layer.
      Parameters:
      tariffId - ID of the Tariff to remove.
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer.

    • addTariff

      void addTariff(TariffForm tariffForm) throws TariffServiceException
      Adds a Tariff to the persistence layer.
      Parameters:
      tariffForm - Form containing all necessary information for the new Tariff.
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer.

    • editTariff

      void editTariff(TariffForm tariffForm, int tariffId) throws TariffServiceException
      Modifies a Tariff.
      Parameters:
      tariffForm - Form containing new values for the Tariff.
      tariffId - ID of the Tariff to modify.
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer.

    • updateDaysUntilPayments

      void updateDaysUntilPayments() throws TariffServiceException
      Decrements the number of days until the next payment for all users.
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer.
